subcategories.name: Functionality & Completeness
subcategories.feedback: Core features work well. Task creation, assignment, and tracking are fully functional. Minor edge case with bulk operations.
strengths: All primary user workflows complete successfully
Good error handling for most scenarios
improvements: Handle bulk task operations more gracefully
Add loading states for slower operations

subcategories.name: Real-World Value
subcategories.feedback: Addresses genuine project management pain points. Strong value proposition for small teams.
strengths: Good market fit for target audience
improvements: Expand use cases beyond small teams

subcategories.name: Code Quality
subcategories.feedback: Well-structured code with good practices. Clean architecture and proper error handling.

subcategories.name: Effective Use of Features
subcategories.feedback: Excellent use of Kiro CLI throughout development. Strong steering documents and context management.

subcategories.name: Custom Commands Quality
subcategories.feedback: Well-designed custom prompts for project workflow. Clear objectives and good reusability.
improvements: Add more specialized prompts for testing

subcategories.name: Workflow Innovation
subcategories.feedback: Creative use of hooks for automated documentation updates. Good workflow optimization.
strengths: Innovative use of hooks for automation

subcategories.name: Completeness
subcategories.feedback: Most required documentation present. README and DEVLOG are comprehensive.
strengths: Detailed README with clear setup instructions

subcategories.name: Clarity
subcategories.feedback: Generally clear and well-structured documentation. Good use of formatting.

subcategories.name: Process Transparency
subcategories.feedback: Good documentation of development process and decisions.

subcategories.name: Uniqueness
subcategories.feedback: Good differentiation from existing solutions. Some unique features but could be more innovative.

subcategories.name: Creative Problem-Solving
subcategories.feedback: Solid technical solutions with some creative elements. Good architecture choices.
strengths: Elegant solution to complex workflow problems
improvements: Push boundaries with more innovative solutions

subcategories.name: Demo Video
subcategories.feedback: Good demonstration of key features. Clear audio and video quality.

subcategories.name: README
subcategories.feedback: Professional and polished README with clear value proposition.

strengths: Strong technical implementation with good code quality
Excellent use of Kiro CLI throughout development process
Comprehensive documentation and clear development timeline
Addresses real-world problem with practical solution
Good workflow automation and process optimization
